Name: AGE
Definition: Age of patient with patients over 89 coded as 90+

Name: DIABETES
Definition: Diabetes mellitus with oral agents or insulin

Name: FNSTATUS2
Definition: Functional health status Prior to Surgery

Name: HXCHF
Definition: Heart failure (CHF) in 30 days before surgery

Name: TRANSFUS
Definition: Preop Transfusion of >= 1 unit of whole/packed RBCs in 72 hours prior to surgery

Name: PRINR
Definition: Pre-operative International Normalized Ratio (INR) of PT values
